info.title: JuaJobs API - Products
info.description: API for managing products or services listed by workers on the JuaJobs platform.

get.summary: Retrieve job postings created by a client

200.description: List of job postings by user

get.summary: Retrieve profile for a specific worker
Retrieve applications submitted by a specific worker

200.description: List of applications submitted by user

get.summary: Retrieve all applications for a specific job

200.description: List of applications for the job

get.summary: Retrieve all reviews written for a specific user

200.description: List of reviews for the user

get.summary: Retrieve all payments made or received by a user

200.description: List of payments for the user

patch.summary: Update a message (e.g., mark as read)

get.summary: Retrieve messages sent to or from a user
Get all products posted by a specific worker

location.description: Location where the job is to be performed

clientId.description: ID of the client who created the job

userId.description: ID of the user this profile belongs to

jobId.description: ID of the job applied to

userId.description: ID of the user applying for the job

coverLetter.description: Cover letter or motivation for the job

status.description: Status of the application (e.g., pending, accepted, rejected)

reviewerId.description: ID of the user who wrote the review

revieweeId.description: ID of the user being reviewed

comment.description: Comment or feedback provided by the reviewer

payerId.description: ID of the user making the payment

receiverId.description: ID of the user receiving the payment

jobId.description: ID of the job associated with the payment

status.description: Status of the payment (e.g., pending, completed, failed)

senderId.description: ID of the user sending the message

receiverId.description: ID of the user receiving the message

isRead.description: Whether the message has been read

sentAt.description: Timestamp of when the message was sent

title.description: Name of the product or service

price.description: Price of the product or service

workerId.description: ID of the worker who created the listing

availability.description: Whether the product/service is currently available
